directions: Tear the spinach into bite size pieces and toss in a large bowl with the bean sprouts, clementines and mushrooms.
In a small bowl, whisk together the oil, soy sauce and garlic powder.  Pour over the spinach mixture, toss, and let stand for about 5 minutes to let the flavors blend.
ingredients: 5 cups fresh spinach, rinsed and dried
title: Oriental Spinach Salad
